title: Riot Please
body: Riot please I need 8 more rp :(. To get Khazix, I decided to get skt zed since it was limited so ,PLEASE RIOT I NEED 8 RP.

replies.body:
That's a bit of a stretch. The biggest amount of RP reward for absolutely nothing was 3 that I've heard.

Try drawing a picture or something, and post it on the Miscellaneous boards.
